title: [GAMEPLAY] Orianna Ball Bug
body:
While playing Orianna (possibly only Winter Wonder Orianna), sometimes the ball disappears if the ball is placed on her. This kind of interaction happens whether she picks it up or uses E to place the ball on herself. The ball becomes visible once more after she moves it onto another champion or uses her Q to move the ball. I'm not sure how this bug occurs but I notice that this only happens after Orianna dies. I've heard about this bug occur for one of my friends as well and we both use Winter Wonder Orianna so it could very well be a skin problem. I should note that the shield animation, the grey bubble, still appears around Orianna if she uses E, it's just the ball that disappears.

So far, the only steps I know is:
1. Orianna dies
2. Orianna tries to pick up her ball
3. Ball disappears
